title: Wonderful "petite" hotel easy access to Louvre , Montmartre , Restaurants (Juveniles etc )
text: Warm friendly welcome as always from Moon - clean comfortable rooms - pleasant petit dejeuner - reasonably priced - nothing is too much trouble for the service oriented staff - 5 th time I have stayed hear and no doubt will be back again
